backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing artworks, user profiles, wallets, and purchases with admin‑gated artwork creation and profile authorization logic.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing feature evidence, listing related frontend files, components, and test IDs for two navigation and UI‑split features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, behavior, and roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme configuration defining warm OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variants, and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx with a root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component handling authentication, admin checks, routing, profile setup, and rendering gallery or upload views.
frontend/src/components/AccessDenied.tsx: UI card shown when a non‑admin attempts to access the upload page, with a button navigating back to the gallery.
Admin‑only artwork upload form with image optimization, progress tracking, input validation, and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/AppHeaderNav.tsx: Header navigation that shows Gallery and conditionally the Upload button for authenticated admins using hash‑based routing.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkCard.tsx: Clickable artwork card displaying a thumbnail, title, and formatted price using the image’s direct URL.
frontend/src/components/ArtworkDetailDia: Displays a dialog with artwork details, including image, title, price, description, and creation date.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting the user to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to the user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing login, logout, and identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Queries the backend to determine whether the current authenticated user is an admin.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating artworks and user profile data through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoute.ts: Tracks and updates the current app route based on the URL hash.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and custom color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/utils/formatGBP.ts: Formats a bigint value in pence into a GBP currency string.
frontend/src/utils/imageOptimize.ts: Resizes and compresses images client-side to meet size limits, returning optimized bytes and MIME type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/src/views/GalleryView.tsx: Renders the artwork gallery with loading state, empty-state messaging, and clickable artwork cards.
frontend/src/views/UploadView.tsx: Displays the admin artwork upload page with a heading and the AdminUploadForm component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, feature set, and architectural notes for the Z'art artwork gallery application.
